description: This file defines classes and functions for managing project templates, including template registration, project initialization, and file copying with variable replacements. It includes classes for different project templates, a factory for creating templates, and a main function demonstrating project setup.

classes.name: ProcessingStep
classes.description: Enum for processing steps (Pre-processing and Post-processing).

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Manages template location paths based on project type.

classes.name: ProjectTemplate
classes.description: Abstract base class for project templates, providing initialization, structure generation, testing setup, and processing script execution.

classes.name: ProjectTemplateFactory
classes.description: Factory class for registering and creating project template instances based on project type.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main orchestrator class for initializing projects and waiting for post-processing completion.

classes.name: AndroidTVTemplate
classes.description: Template class for Android TV projects.

classes.name: SpringBootTemplate
classes.description: Template class for Spring Boot projects.

classes.name: ReactNativeTemplate
classes.description: Template class for React Native projects.

classes.name: TizenTemplate
classes.description: Template class for Samsung Tizen TV (React) projects.

classes.name: PostgreSQLTemplate
classes.description: Template class for PostgreSQL database projects.

classes.name: MongoDBTemplate
classes.description: Template class for MongoDB database projects.

classes.name: MySQLTemplate
classes.description: Template class for MySQL database projects.

classes.name: SQLiteTemplate
classes.description: Template class for SQLite database projects.

classes.name: FileSystemHelper
classes.description: Helper class for copying files and directories with variable replacements.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the project by validating parameters, running pre-processing, generating structure, setting up testing, and running post-processing.

methods.name: run_pre_processing
methods.description: Runs the pre-processing script if available.

methods.name: run_post_processing
methods.description: Runs the post-processing script if available.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for post-processing to complete within a timeout.

methods.name: _run_processing_script
methods.description: Executes a processing script, optionally in background for post-processing.

methods.name: create_template
methods.description: Creates a project template instance based on project type.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Creates and initializes a project based on configuration.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Loads project configuration from a JSON file.
